website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for something more durable for your kendama fan, give this cherry wood Pill a try. But keep in mind – the same density that makes it more durable than bamboo also makes it heavier and more difficult to perform tricks.
pros: Made of cherry wood, so it's more durable than traditional bamboo kendamas
Can be used by both left handed and right handed players
Comes with instructions, stickers, replacement string, and bead
Easy to fit in your pocket
cons: Harder to do some tricks because of the weight of cherry wood

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous Durability and Play.
customer_reviews.text: This pill is so solid. I feel like it being heavier helps with flip manipulation(swing spikes, earth turns). The spike was also hardcore. My friend was the best at flattening spikes, and he barely dented it to this day( like half a year when written). Compared to some less dense woods I've used, I found this amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the cherry wood
customer_reviews.text: It is well-made, solid and durable. It’s challenging and that’s a good thing. I put on some beeswax-orange oil wood polish to bring out the beauty of the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE PILL!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BRAND OF KENDAMA!!!! ITS WELL WORTH THE EXTRA $$
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as gift for my friend who loves his Kadama. He loves it and was so impressed with the quality of wood that he ordered a standard kadama from the company as well.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Pill!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he absolutely loves it! The natural cherry looks great and the Pill has very good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Team Mac

customer_reviews.title: Non-Electronic Toy Teenagers Actually Love
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when my teenage son asked for the Kendama - FINALLY - he wanted something NON-ELECTRONIC. He and his posse of friends all love this thing and I love it too!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson's love this thing
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson's love this thing, what more can I say but well made and best price point here on Amazon... R/ KMW

customer_reviews.text: great skill toy when your not jamming on a kendama. The inventor is Alex Smith, he has his own pro model kendama as well and is a fantastic kendana too.

customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! Beautiful wood, well made product! A+++++

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this wooden toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this wooden toy! Hours of click-clack fun. Different challenge from the classic Kendama. Love the dark cherry wood. No paint to chip. Has held up nicely with as much use as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Erica G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent add on
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toy to add with your Kendama collection. Definitely worth a try. Cherry wood is High Quality. I would recommend getting a hardwood Kendama with this if you don't.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best kendamas for the money! My son LOVES this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ljholsten

customer_reviews.title: ... item was for my son and he was very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This item was for my son and he was very happy with it. It was exactly what he thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Beth Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Helps Coordination
customer_reviews.text: This one is a lot harder than the previous ones I have bought. The grandchildren love it, and I leave it on the coffee table so they can readily grab it, go outside and play. A finitely a device or toy to work on eye hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Gazmuth

customer_reviews.title: Great times
customer_reviews.text: Terra has done a wonderful job on this simple but difficult skill toy. Kendama usa are amazing individuals who are all ways willing to give insight if your looking to step up your kendama skills or just looking for some new clean fun the pill is the choice
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W.

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple toy but it provides countless hours of fun. My son is a kendamas fanatic so this "pill" is a must. It's sturdy and easy to put into your pocket and it keeps you entertained especially when you're waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Ivett V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old played with it for about 2 weeks.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is PERFECT!!! Since it does not have paint you can't see any chips!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this for Christmas and he just loves it. What a great product!

customer_reviews.title: No strings.
customer_reviews.text: Did not include extra string as mentioned. Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: connie english

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and super easy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old LOVES this thing! It's a very easy kendama to learn on--- way easier then the regular kendamas which he also uses. Beautiful wood. He can even so an 'earth turn' on this (totally feels out watching u tube vids on kendamas).
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Cole Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Solidly constructed however my sons lost interest and went back to their regular Kendamas after less than a day. An overall waste of money and natural resources if you ask me. 3 stars since it is made well.
customer_reviews.author: ProfesShanel

product_meta.title: Samorthatrade Terra Kendama - The Pill - Natural Cherry Wood
product_meta.description: The Pill is a brand new juggling toy developed by Terra Kendama. With simplicity, creativity and playability in the mind, the Pill is an interesting toy that will challenge and inspire the player to discover increasingly complex ad creative tricks. Satisfying spikes, endless air trick combos, and skillful balances will improve the player's dexterity, hand-eye coordination and creativity.
feature_bullets: Terra Kendama - The Pill - Natural Cherry Wood
